item.description:
List of Research, Statistics, and Evaluation job postings (that I’ve seen) as of Feb 2025.

Postings for (2024-2025):

  • Post-doctoral Research Associate- Educational Measurement and Statistics- University of Tennessee, Knoxville, Knoxville, TN
  • Learning Sciences Faculty Cluster Hires (Open-Rank and Tenure-Track; Educational Data Science and Analytics, AI and Education, and Advanced Quantitative Research Methods, Measurement and/or Evaluation; 5 positions) Clemson University in Clemson, SC

  • Assistant/Associate Professor of Research Design, Methods, and Analysis, William & Mary in Williamsburg, VA

As of 2024.12

  • Assistant Professor in Quantitative Methods in Educational Research, UC Santa Barbara (NOTE: may also be at the Associate level)
  • Assistant/Associate Professor, Quantitative and/or Mixed Methods Applied Research, Appalachian State University, North Carolina, United States

As of 2024.11

  • Assistant Professor in Quantitative Methods in Educational Research, University of California Santa Barbara
  • Tenure Eligible (probationary) Open Rank for the Department of Emergency Medicine as a Research Methodologist, Professor (Open Rank) - R106021 University of Louisville in Louisville, KY
  • Assistant or Associate Professor of Critical Quantitative Research University of California, Riverside, CA

As of 2024.09

  • Assistant/Associate Professor Of Quantitative Methodology, Georgia State University Atlanta, GA
  • Assistant Professor (Quant Psych), University of North Carolina at Chapel Hill
  • Open-Rank Tenure-Track Faculty Position in Quantitative Methods, Rossier School of Education, Los Angeles, California
  • Tenured Associate or Full Professor in Evaluation Studies (# 364671), University of Minnesota, Twin Cities, MN
  • Assistant/Associate Professor - QME Educational Statistics, University of Minnesota Twin Cities, MN
  • Assistant Professor of Quantitative Psychology, California State University, Long Beach
  • Assistant Professor, Quantitative Psychology (Open Area), Claremont McKenna College, California
  • Assistant/Associate Professor of Evaluation in Education, University of California Los Angeles
  • Associate/Full Professor, Tenured, Quantitative Methods, Educational Psychology, Baylor University, Waco, TX

As of 2024.08

  • Assistant Professor, Psychology (Quantitative) Tenure-track, Ohio University, Athens, Ohio
  • Assistant Professor of Quantitative Psychology, California State University, Long Beach
  • Research Assistant Professor, Nebraska Academy for Methodology, Analytics & Psychometrics, Nebraska Center for Research on Children, Youth, Families and Schools, College of Education and Human Sciences, University of Nebraska-Lincoln
  • Assistant Professor, Tenure-Track, Educational Data Science - Counseling, School, and Educational Psychology, University at Buffalo, Buffalo, NY

As of 2024.07

—END
